name: I Can't Believe I Ate the Whole Thing html5 edn
name_original: I Can't Believe I Ate the Whole Thing html5 edn
description:
This is my second game made in a week. It's a typing game and the faster you type the quicker the character eats. If you make a mistake or take to long the player chokes. Choke more than three times on a single word and it is game over.

Created by Noel Barrot (@noelbarrot_3D)

Song 'join the bugs (johnny_ripper remix)' by atuin from freemusicarchive.org: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/atuin/

The first 15 seconds of the song has been cut.

All sound effects from freesfx.co.uk: http://www.freesfx.co.uk

Font 'Cake Nom' created by Jonathan Harris: www.tattoowoo.com/fonts
